title: Correction to: The RNA-binding protein MdHYL1 modulates cold tolerance and disease resistance in apple
content: This is a correction to: Xiaoxia Shen, Yi Song, Yikun Ping, Jieqiang He, Yinpeng Xie, Fengwang Ma, Xuewei Li, Qingmei Guan, The RNA-binding protein MdHYL1 modulates cold tolerance and disease resistance in apple, Plant Physiology, Volume 192, Issue 3, July 2023, Pages 2143â€“2160, https://doi.org/10.1093/plphys/kiad187
